186015814.review:
大地图细节还是比6代精致不少，就是奇妙的3d地图总是让人找不着路
打击感真的有点莫名其妙的怪异
7代融合了6代模型、控制区域，5代技能轮，3代攻防属性计算的一些亮点，还有本地驻军这种独特的设计，可能是因为狗屎育碧给制作组做游戏的预算有限，最后呈现出的效果不尽人意，有很强的不协调感
总的来说我个人认为整体游玩观感略逊于6代

185421616.review:
Its a fun game most of the time. 

However I have some issues with it. Spells are too good. A might hero has no chance against a spell hero. Even a child would see the issues with having spells like tsunami or chain lightning. What's a non spell hero supposed to do when the enemy can erase half his army in one spell. The game needs seriously toned down spells or increase in might hero's damage output in some way.

Also in the campaign the enemy can just infinitely respawn his lvl 30 or something hero again and again. It gets very tiresome that there is no stopping or punishment from loosing. I even suspect that there is not even a gold requirement for the compuer since he can infinitely spawn new hereoes in the campaign. It's just stupid. There should be limits to how many times a dead hero can resurface. At least there should be penalties like loosing levels or something.

185397325.review:
Je me suis refait quelques parties des différents HOMM à partir du 3. ET franchement j'avais peu de souvenir de ce septième opus, bien qu'il soit le plus récent. Et pourtant, en y rejouant sur le Steamdeck aujourd'hui, c'est un très bon HOMM, très grandement sous-évalué à mon avis.
Sur le deck ça tourne parfaitement, même le launcher ubisoft ne pose aucun problème. 

Tant qu'on reste sur la partie solo, il n'y a aucune grosse critique qui me vienne à l'esprit. Ceux qui n'aiment pas la formule des HOMM n'aimeront bien sûr pas mais sinon les campagnes sont agréables à parcourir et le contenu est conséquent. Cerise sur le gâteau ça reste plutôt joli aujourd'hui, là ou les opus plus anciens piquent un peu les yeux.

185115420.review: As a fan of the Heroes franchise since Heroes II was released I have a long basis for comparison. So, I feel that while this game lacks some overall story depth, loss of some micromanaging aspects I love....and the AI mechanics are a bit dumb....I had come to expect better from the series (favorite release is of course Heroes III) It IS overall an enjoyable game. Yes, Ubisoft makes it more annoying with launcher (which crashes often) and all that blah blah blah. I don't care about gaming politic garbage. Is a game fun, or not?! That's all I care about. And this game in my opinion is fun enough for a positive review despite its parts that can at times drive me crazy! I've completed the Haven campaign and now I'm part way through the Necromancer campaign. I'll keep playing through and see if my opinion changes.....

184675799.review:
As a huge fan of Might&Magic; especially HMM3 like everyone, I genuinely liked this game. It caught my attention that most and many of the negative comments about this game are complaints about game requiring to connect Ubisoft while starting. I know, it's not the greatest experience, however, I believe it's not fair to be so harsh on the game after playing it.

Combat mechanics are delightful and much easier to handle than HMM3. There are many interesting units as always with unique abilities. Only thing I would like more is if they didn't remove the Inferno faction from the playable factions. Other than that, everything is really nice. Once you get used to visuals, it's a delightful experience. I liked the campaigns a lot. They occupy some considerable time to give you game experience with each faction to get a taste of each and get into the game. I recommend the campaigns a lot as also a fan of Might&Magic lore.

184104904.review:
任何时候都只推荐情怀老玩家入，就算新玩家想要入坑此系列也不要从这一代入。
如果不是为了新鲜感和在仅有一台电脑时有新的多人游戏可玩，宁愿去玩3和5。无论是探索还是战斗总感觉所有人的动作慢半拍，或者说充满了伪精致的小家子气，没有征战四方的爽快感。此外，不会对此代任何一个种族、任何一个生物有任何好脸色，完全找不到喜欢的兵种。如果说建模还稍微体现一下游戏的画面更迭，那页游风主城和劣质地摊小故事书般的生物插画直接让游戏一下low了几个档次。另外，BUG很多，有些甚至影响游戏性，切繁中还会导致物品描述文本丢失，体验感非常不好。
